mimIqtE &yA#tayAmniyAyAtayAmniyaiqvaina#M mimItEq tasmAqnnAnA#vIryA aq~ggula#yaqH sarvA$sva~gguqShThamupaq ni gRu#hNAtiq tasmA$th saqmAva#dvIryOq&nyABi#-raq~gguli#BiqstasmAqth sarvAq anuq saM ca#ratiq yath saqha sarvA#BiqrmimI#taq sa(gg)Sli#ShTA aq~ggula#yO jAyEraq-nnEka#yaikayOqth sarga#M mimItEq tasmAqd 
viBa#ktA jAyantEq pa~jcaq kRutvOq yaju#ShA mimItEq pa~jcA$kSharA paq~gktiH pA~gktO# yaqj~jO yaqj~jamEqvAva# rundhEq pa~jcaq kRutva#stUqShNIM- [  ] 63
